product_name: MOON Take A Hike: Washington D.C.
long_description: Find some fresh air and an escape from city life with the help of MOON. Author: Theresa Dowell Blackinton. Softcover; 319 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Avalon Travel Publishing; copyright 2013. . Includes descriptions of trails ranging from short, flat routes suitable for families to day-long, steep treks for more advanced hikers. Hiking profiles include difficulty ratings, length, time and elevation gain, as well as an overview map with a basic sketch of the route. Hikes are grouped by interest, such as "Best Hikes for Historic Sites," "Best For Kids" and "Best Waterfalls". MOON.
short_description: Find some fresh air and an escape from city life with the help of MOON Take a Hike: Washington D.C. . It offers 80 hikes within a 2 hr. drive of the city.
